mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name AS name, l.reservelist_pk AS reserveNo, COUNT(r.reserve_pk) AS seatCount, GROUP_CONCAT(r.zone_pk) AS zone, GROUP_CONCAT(r.seat_num) AS seat, l.is_cancel AS isCancel, l.is_pay AS isPay, DATE(g.game_date) AS gameDate, DATE(l.cancel_date) AS cancelDate FROM reservation_list l JOIN user u ON l.user_pk = u.user_pk LEFT JOIN reservations r ON l.reservelist_pk = r.reservelist_pk JOIN games g ON g.game_pk = l.game_pk GROUP BY l.reservelist_pk, u.user_name, l.is_cancel, g.game_date, l.cancel_date ORDER BY l.reservelist_pk LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games FROM games WHERE stadium_pk = 1 AND game_pk NOT IN (SELECT game_pk FROM homegame)

SELECT game_pk as gameNo, team_pk as opponentTeam, our_score as ourScore, opp_score as opponentScore, result, DATE_FORMAT(game_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as gameDate FROM games WHERE stadium_pk = 1 AND game_pk NOT IN (SELECT game_pk FROM homegame) AND game_date >= SYSDATE() ORDER BY game_date DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT g.game_pk as gameNo, t.team_name as opponentTeamName, DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as gameDate, s.location as stadium FROM games g JOIN team t ON t.team_pk = g.team_pk JOIN stadium s ON s.stadium_pk = g.stadium_pk WHERE g.game_pk = #{gameNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homegame(game_pk, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{gameNo}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
